headline: Assessing 3M (MMM) Valuation As The Stock Shows Mixed Recent Share Price Performance
summary: 3M (MMM) is back in focus after recent share price moves, giving investors a fresh reason to look at how the conglomerate’s fundamentals and valuation stack up across its diversified business segments. See our latest analysis for 3M. At a share price of $165.32, 3M’s recent 1 month share price return of 6.02% contrasts with a 3 month share price decline of 3.91%. The 3 year total shareholder return of 96.96% points to a much stronger long term outcome. If this mixed performance has you...
